TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementDateTimeConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供将 DMTF 日期时间和时间间隔转换为符合 CLR 的 和 格式（或执行相反转换）的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to convert DMTF datetime and time intervals to CLR-compliant and format and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime ToDateTime(string dmtfDate) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToDateTime (dmtfDate As String) As DateTime

param.name: dmtfDate
param.span: 用 DMTF 格式表示日期时间的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the datetime in DMTF format.

summary.span: 将给定的 DMTF 日期时间转换为 。

span.span: Converts a given DMTF datetime to .

summary.span: 返回的 将基于系统的当前时区。

span.span: The returned will be in the current time zone of the system.

returns.span: ，它表示给定的 DMTF 日期时间。

span.span: A that represents the given DMTF datetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期和时间在 WMI 中以 DMTF 日期时间格式表示。Date and time in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. WMI SDK 文档中介绍此格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF 日期时间字符串具有 UTC 偏移量此日期时间字符串表示。A DMTF datetime string has an UTC offset which this datetime string represents. 转换到期间，用于将日期转换为当前时区 UTC 偏移量。During conversion to , the UTC offset is used to convert the date to the current time zone. 根据 DMTF 格式的特定字段可以表示字符 \*。According to DMTF format, a particular field can be represented by the character '\*'. 这将转换为可在中表示此字段的值。This will be converted to the value of this field that can be represented in . ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 以下示例将转换为 DMTF 日期时间字符串。The following example converts a DMTF datetime string into a . [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function ToDmtfDateTime (date As DateTime) As String

param.name: date
param.span: ，它表示将转换为 DMTF 日期时间的日期时间。

span.span: A representing the datetime to be converted to DMTF datetime.

summary.span: 将给定的 转换为 DMTF 日期时间格式。

span.span: Converts a given to DMTF datetime format.

returns.span: 一个字符串，它表示给定的 的 DMTF 日期时间。

span.span: A string that represents the DMTF datetime for the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期和时间在 WMI 中以 DMTF 日期时间格式表示。Date and time in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. WMI SDK 文档中介绍此格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF 日期时间字符串表示将根据当前时区的 UTC 偏移量。The DMTF datetime string represented will be with respect to the UTC offset of the current time zone. DMTF 中的最小精度是微秒数;在中，最小精度是，等效于 100 纳秒。The lowest precision in DMTF is microseconds; in , the lowest precision is , which are equivalent to 100 nanoseconds. 在转换期间，转换为微秒并将其舍入到最接近的低至微秒。During conversion, are converted to microseconds and rounded off to the nearest microsecond. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将为给定为 DMTF 日期时间格式。The following example converts a given to DMTF datetime format. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WMI 中的时间间隔以 DMTF 日期时间格式表示。Time interval in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. WMI SDK 文档中介绍此格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF 中的最小精度是微秒数;在中，最小精度是，等效于 100 纳秒。The lowest precision in DMTF is microseconds; in , the lowest precision is , which is equivalent to 100 nanoseconds. 在转换期间，转换为微秒并将其舍入到最接近的低至微秒。During conversion, are converted to microseconds and rounded off to the nearest microsecond. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将为给定为 DMTF 时间间隔。The following example converts a given to DMTF time interval.
